description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 10x + 9.
comments: n, 10*n+9, 100*n+99, 1000*n+999, 10000*n+9999 and 100000*n+99999 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..19000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(10*n+9) and IsPrime(100*n+99) and IsPrime(1000*n+999) and IsPrime(10000*n+9999) and IsPrime(100000*n+99999)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
